title: Minimally Covering NSEC Records and DNSSEC On-line Signing
abstract:
This document describes how to construct DNSSEC NSEC resource records that cover a smaller range of names
than called for by RFC 4034.  By generating and signing these records
on demand, authoritative name servers can effectively stop the
disclosure of zone contents otherwise made possible by walking the
chain of NSEC records in a signed zone.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
